alert.note: Alert for Muhlenberg (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 06 at 5:43PM EST until March 10 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Paducah KY has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Kentucky... Green River at Paradise Green River at Calhoun .Recent rainfall in the basin has caused additional rises on the Green River, and at Paradise and Calhoun, the river is now forecast to rise above flood stage tonight or early Monday. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING THROUGH THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Green River at Paradise. * WHEN...Until early Thursday afternoon. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 4:15 PM CST Sunday the stage was 379.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage this evening to a crest of 382.2 feet tomorrow evening. It will then fall below flood stage Thursday morning. - Flood stage is 380.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
